snippet: The attacker has insisted since his arrest and during the trial that he never intended to kill Mark W. Lippert, who suffered serious wounds.
abstract: South Korean man Kim Ki-jong, who attacked American ambassador Mark W Lippert with kitchen knife, is sentenced to 12 years in prison for attempted murder.
lead_paragraph: The attacker has insisted since his arrest and during the trial that he never intended to kill Mark W. Lippert, who suffered serious wounds.

headline.main: Prison for Man Who Slashed U.S. Ambassador in South Korea
headline.print_headline: Prison for Man Who Attacked Envoy in Seoul
